# Monix JVM App Template

[![Build status](https://github.com/monix/monix-jvm-app-template.g8/workflows/build/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/monix/monix-jvm-app-template.g8/actions?query=branch%3Amaster+workflow%3Abuild) [![Scala Steward badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Scala_Steward-helping-blue.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://scala-steward.org)

This is a [Giter8][g8] template for [Monix][monix] JVM apps.

## Usage

Using [sbt](https://www.scala-sbt.org/download.html) run the following in a terminal:

```sh
sbt --sbt-version 1.3.13 new monix/monix-jvm-app-template.g8
```

## Other Templates

- [alexandru/typelevel-library.g8](https://github.com/alexandru/typelevel-library.g8): a template for initiating a Typelevel library, with everything ready to be published

[monix]: https://monix.io
